en-US.summary: Kick start your day with these upbeat morning meditations.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Power Nap to play Faith Hunter
Alexa, ask Power Nap to play Franko Heke
en-US.name: Power Nap
en-US.description:
Power Nap by Meditation Studio offers two guided meditations designed specifically to help you relax, fall asleep, and recharge those batteries! Nod off to the soothing voice of Faith Hunter or Franko Heke, two of our most popular meditation instructors. Short afternoon naps can help you feel more focused, productive and alert. Jump start your day with a midday snooze and these quick (less than nine minutes!) and simple meditations.

Here are some examples of what you can say: 
“Alexa, ask Power Nap to play Faith Hunter.” 
“Alexa, ask Power Nap to play Franko Heke.” 
“Alexa, play the first one.” 
“Alexa, play the next one.” 
“Alexa, play the previous one.”
“Alexa, help.”

The skill includes full audio player functionality. 

If Power Nap helps you catch some quick z’s, let us know by giving us a 5-star rating! 

If you think Power Nap needs some extra love, please let us know that too at alexa@meditationstudioapp.com. We’ll do our best to make it better!

OUR OTHER SKILLS:
Meditation Studio
Launch Meditation Studio for award-winning guided meditations designed to help with your everyday challenges, including sleep, stress, happiness and performance.

Goodnight Kiddo
Launch Goodnight Kiddo for simple, guided meditations to help your little ones, ages four to ten, unwind and gently fall asleep. A premium version of this skill is included in Freetime Unlimited.

Rise and Shine
Launch Rise and Shine to kick start your day with morning meditations designed to help you feel more calm, positive, and grateful. 

ABOUT MEDITATION STUDIO
Meditation Studio is a 5-star app that offers more than 500 original guided meditations and 6 courses from some of the world’s leading teachers. Our app has been celebrated for its first-class teachers, the wide variety of meditation styles, and its beautiful and simple interface.

You can find Meditation Studio in the Apple App Store and the Google Play store.
• Featured by Apple as “10 Best Apps of the Year” 
• Featured by TIME as “50 Best Apps of the Year” 
• Featured by Forbes as “Best Health & Fitness Apps of 2017”

Whether you want to lower stress, reduce anxiety, get a good night’s sleep, increase your confidence or just feel a little more focused and productive, we’ve got you covered.

Find out even more at meditationstudioapp.com.
